text: Anupam Shyam (20 September 1957 â€“ 8 August 2021) was an Indian actor. He was known for playing villain roles. He played Thakur Sajjan Singh in the STAR Plus TV series Mann Kee Awaaz Pratigya. He also appeared in Slumdog Millionaire (2008). Shyam was born in Pratapgarh, India. His career began in 1993. Shyam died on 8 August 2021 at a hospital in Mumbai from multiple organ failure, aged 63. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian stage actors
title: Anupam Shyam
